author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
One would hope that they have thought it through and given one of the oiks a bicycle so he can pedal back from the prow lookout station to warn the bridge if they are heading for anything expensive.
Are we going to see Great Lakes style forward bridges on future ships?

author: D. Peter Boucher, Kt. SMOM, International Master Mariner (retd.)
content:
Another piece of nonsense for the OOW to deal with keeping a lookout from the Bridge. Naturally the IMO is useless in enforcing the ROR but will race to punish those involved when something, as it will, goes wrong. Imagine this going up the English Channel or past Singapore at night for example.

Good Watch
